name: Impulse (rogueElementGames)
description:
This game was made for the 2019 GMTK Jam. The theme is "only one"

Navigate your rocket to the station to complete each level. Use the gravity of planets and moons to push you in the right direction.  You can only fire your manouvering thrusters once each level, so it has to be just right! Good luck, cadet!

Controls:

zoom - mouse wheel / i and o

scroll over map before launch - wsad / arrow keys

rotate rocket (after launch) - ad or left and right arrows

adjust burn time - z and x

launch rocket - space

begin manouvering burn - space again
